high_descs: Turn around, move to the tub.
Pick up the rag on the right side of the tub.
Bring the rag to the toilet on your left.
Put the rag on the toilet tank lid.
anns.task_desc: Put a rag on the toilet tank lid.

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bathtub
Pick up the purple towel that is on the very right
Turn around to face the side of the toilet
Place the purple towel on the back of the toilet
anns.task_desc: Place a towel on the back of a toilet

high_descs: pick up the purple rag that is in tub
turn left, walk forward, turn left to face toilet
put the rag on the back of the toilet
anns.task_desc: move rag from tub to back of toilet
